hanzi-su-wiki:
旺

Значения

Процветающий

Мнемоника

Царственность 王 лучей солнца 日, дающих всем процветание.
purpleculture_pinyin:
wàng
prosperous; flourishing; (of flowers) blooming; (of fire) roaring
процветающий; процветание; (цветов) цветение; (огня) рев
rtega_mnemonic:
旺旺RSprosper, prosperous, increase, brilliant, bright
  • the sun 日 shines favourably and bright on prosperous kings 王
purpleculture_info: Pictophonetic: 王 indicates the sound; 日 (sun) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
旺盛 [ wàng shèng ]: vigorous; exuberant
兴旺 [ xīng wàng ]: prosperous; thriving; to prosper; to flourish
旺季 [ wàng jì ]: busy season; peak period; see also 淡季
健旺 [ jiàn wàng ]: robust; healthy; vigorous; energetic
普罗旺斯 [ pǔ luó wàng sī ]: Provence (south of France)
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 日 [ rì ] sun; day; daytime
    • 王 [ wáng ] king, ruler; royal; surname
heisig_chinese_memo: The Sun King needs the power of the sun to keep thriving. &nbsp
heisig_constituent: effulgent, sun, day, king, jewel, ball
heisig_story: The radiant, effulgent splendor of he sun makes it king of all the planets and other stars. Just to be sure you don't take this too abstractly, picture the sun seated on a throne, flourishing its scepter this way and that.
koohiiStory1: The Sun King (Louis XIV) was known for his effulgent reign.
koohiiStory2: [+katsuo] This is the Sun King. Sayeth Wikipedia: "The Sun King (in French le Roi Soleil) because of the idea that, just as the planets revolve around the Sun, so too should France and the court revolve around [the king] ("http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Louis_XIV_of_France). And just like the sun, he was quite effulgent and actually emitted sunlight.
kunYomi: かがや.き、うつくし.い、さかん

  • brimming with curiosity

    • edict2
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the sun (日) king (王) is flourishing

humanum_full_description_en:
Bronze inscription from " day ", "㞷" sound. Used as a person’s name, such as Chen Wangji: "[Chen Tu] (Chen) Wang’s Sui Lai (made) 𢊾 (Fu) [丯Ge] (頯格)." "Chen Wang" is a person’s name, "Chen Wang’s age "It records the year by events, referring to the year in which Chen Wang's incident occurred. (See Huang Xiquan)

Xiaozhuan makes "暀" from " day " to " to ". " To " the beginning of the text as "㞷" post-increment ' left foot next to the "to"㞷"as sound. "暀" from the sound of " to " and " wang " from the sound of "㞷" are a variant of the word. See "㞷", " to ", " Wang ."

" Wang " means prosperity and prosperity. For example, Zhuge Liang of the Three Kingdoms Shu "Administration of the Army": "Being to live for death, for the people to be the widow, to be prosperous to decline, and to wait for the coming." easy. "Programme on": "If there is energy and form, there are counts, and things have decay and prosperity, and you can know it by pushing it through."
humanum_short_description_en: Bronze inscription from " day ", "㞷" sound. Xiaozhuan's "暀" is a variant of the word. " Wang " means prosperity and prosperity.
humanum_full_description:
金文從「日」，「㞷」聲。用作人名，如陳旺戟：「[陳土]（陳）旺之歲俈（造）𢊾（府）之[丯戈]（戟）。」「陳旺」是人名，「陳旺之歲」乃以事記年，指發生陳旺的事件那一年。（參黃錫全）

　　小篆作「暀」，從「日」，「往」聲。「往」的初文作「㞷」，後增「彳」旁，以「㞷」為聲。「暀」從「往」聲與「旺」從「㞷」聲為一字異體。參見「㞷」、「往」、「暀」。

　　「旺」表示興盛、興旺。如三國蜀諸葛亮〈治軍〉：「以生待死，以眾待寡，以旺待衰，以伏待來。」《朱子語類．易．綱領上》：「有氣有形便有數，物有衰旺，推其始終，便可知也。」
humanum_short_description: 金文從「日」，「㞷」聲。小篆作「暀」，為一字異體。「旺」表示興盛、興旺。

Liushutong characters (2)

旺字的基本解释

旺
wàng
盛，兴盛：旺年（水果等丰收的年份，俗称“大年”）。旺盛（sh坣g ）。兴旺。旺季。

旺字的汉语字典释义

[①]［wàng］
［《廣韻》于放切，去漾，云。］
“暀2”的被通假字。
(1)兴旺；旺盛。
(2)谓使兴旺。
(3)姓。明有旺迟。见明顾起元《客座赘语·僻姓》。

旺字的英文翻译

◎ 旺
flourishing, prosperous, vigorous

旺字的康熙字典解释

【辰集上】【日字部】　旺； 康熙笔画：8； 页码：页490第24
【集韻】【正韻】?于放切，王去聲。同?。或作旺。光美也。【玉篇】日暈。

旺字的源字形

旺字的起名意思

：原义是指光彩美丽，也指光明旺盛，引申指火势剧烈，也形容事业兴隆、发达、繁盛。

Prosperous
Basic explanation of words
Prosperous
wàng
Prosperous, prosperous: prosperous years (years of fruit and other harvests, commonly known as "big new years"). Exuberant (sh坣g). thriving. Peak season.
Prosperous
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［wàng］
["Guangyun" Yu Fangqie, go to Yang, cloud. ]
The false word for "暀2" was passed.
(1) Prosperous; exuberant.
(2) It is prosperous.
(3) Last name. Obviously late. See Ming Gu Qiyuan's "Gu Qiyuan".
Prosperous
English translation of words
◎ Wang
flourishing, prosperous, vigorous
Prosperous
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji 1] [Japanese Character Department] 　wang; Kangxi strokes: 8; page number: page 490 24
[Ji Yun] [Zheng Yun]? Yu Fangqie, Wang Qusheng. with?. Or be prosperous. Light beauty also. [Jade articles] Solar halo.
Prosperous
Source glyph
Prosperous
Name meaning
: The original meaning refers to the brilliance and beauty, but also refers to the bright and exuberant, the extended meaning refers to the fierce fire, and also refers to the prosperous, developed, and prosperous career.
形声字。篆书从日(太阳),往(wing)声,往有去、到义,表示太阳发出炽热的光芒。隶、楷书从日(太阳),王(wang )
声,王有统治君临义,表示日光炽烈,普照大地。本义是炽热。
引申为兴盛。
①炽烈:~火「肝火~。2兴盛:~盛|~季|兴~。
~季 ~年 ~盛 ~月 健~ 兴~ 六畜兴~
旺
wàng
唯旺
旺
隶
楷
Пиктофонетические символы.
Сценарий печати идет от солнца (солнца) к звуку (крыла) и к праведности, что означает, что солнце испускает горячие лучи света.
Ли, обычное письмо от солнца (солнца), звук короля (ван), король правил праведностью монарха, что означает, что солнце пылает, и земля сияет над всей землей.
Первоначальный смысл пылает.
Расширение - процветание.
①Blazing: ~ Fire "Rapid ~. 2 Процветание: ~ Sheng | ~ Ji | Xing ~.
~ Цзи ~ Нянь ~ Шэн ~ Юэцзян ~ Син ~ Лю ХуСин ~
Процветающий
Weiwang
Процветающий
писец
Кай
wàng
1) яркий; блестящий; пылающий; ярко; разгореться, пылать
火照得很旺 огонь горит очень ярко
2) цветущий, процветающий; оживлённый, буйный; в расцвете, на подъёме; в разгаре; пик; по сезону, в моде
生意很旺 торговля (дело) процветает
旺地 счастливая земля, процветающий край
3) боевой; бодрый
士气正旺 дух бойцов весьма высок
II собств.
Ван (фамилия)
